Package edu.unika.aifb.foam.agenda

Interface Summary
Agenda The agenda classes are used to determine which entities should be compared.
 

Class Summary
AgendaElement An AgendaElement is the individual element containing information about what to compare i.e. the two entities and the kind of comparison which is required.
AgendaImpl The general implementation of an agenda.
AllMatchesAgenda This Agenda triggers comparisons between entities which have been identified as similar or one of the most similar in previous iterations.
ChangePropagationAgenda If an adjacent node in the ontology graph has changed during the last alignment iteration, the entity is scheduled for comparison in the next run.
ClosestLabelAgenda The system checks the labels of various entities.
CompleteAgenda The simplest and largest agenda.
CompleteInstanceAgenda All instances are compared with all other instances, resulting in n x m comparisons.
EmptyAgenda A dummy agenda, it is empty.
ExplicitAgenda Loads a list of entities, e.g. from a former alignment process, another system, or user defined.
RandomAgenda This agenda has its entries assigned randomly.
